meanings.definition: Unable to be resolved or settled
meanings.sent1: The conflict between the two friends was unresolvable.
meanings.sent2: The unresolvable issue led to a permanent rift in their relationship.
meanings.sent3: The unresolvable argument over who gets the last cookie became a running joke.
meanings.sent4: The unresolvable tension in the room could be cut with a knife.
meanings.sent5: The unresolvable disagreement lingered in the air long after they had left.

meanings.definition: Not able to be solved or fixed
meanings.sent1: The unresolvable technical glitch caused the system to crash.
meanings.sent2: Despite numerous attempts, the unresolvable error message kept popping up.
meanings.sent3: The unresolvable leak in the roof seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her unresolvable fear of spiders paralyzed her with every encounter.
meanings.sent5: The unresolvable mystery of the missing keys baffled everyone in the house.
